topic: Ethical considerations in energy data simulations
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that running a simulation focused on varying key variables or conditions relevant to our objectives will yield the most beneficial new data. The next step is to identify the specific variables and select a suitable simulation tool or framework that can accurately model these scenarios.
